 1: <?php
 2: 
 3:     namespace UserApp\Widget\Session;
 4: 
 5:     class NativeSession implements ISession {
 6:         public function __construct(){
 7:             session_start();
 8:         }
 9: 
10:         public function has($key){
11:             return isset($_SESSION[$key]);
12:         }
13: 
14:         public function get($key){
15:             return $_SESSION[$key];
16:         }
17: 
18:         public function set($key, $value){
19:             $_SESSION[$key] = $value;
20:         }
21: 
22:         public function remove($key){
23:             unset($_SESSION[$key]);
24:         }
25:     }
26: 
27: ?>
